entries.title: How to add an AirTag to Find My on iPhone
entries.description: If you've just gotten an Apple AirTag and need help setting it up, I'm here to tell you the process couldn't be easier. Still, we'll walk through the steps, so you can start tracking your most important items.

entries.title: Apple updates the HomePod with improved sound, Matter support, new sensors
entries.description: The HomePod is back. It looks the same, but there are plenty of changes to be found under the cloth exterior.

entries.title: This hidden iPhone feature can help you fall asleep faster
entries.description: Deep inside your iPhone’s Settings app is a feature that can help lull you to sleep or drown out your neighbor's snoring. You just have to know where to find it.

entries.title: Apple Mac Mini (2023) vs Mac Studio: Is M2 really better than M1?
entries.description: Apple's new $600 Mac Mini likely generated many sideways glances at the $2,000+ M1 Mac Studio. But, this seeming cannibalism of the Mac Studio is not as one-sided as it seems. Let me explain.

entries.title: How to improve sound quality on iPhone calls
entries.description: It's like having noise cancelation, but for your voice.

entries.title: Twitter's new blue checkmark isn't always blue, and other verification system changes
entries.description: Here are all of Twitter's many account verification changes explained.

entries.title: Save $74 on NuraTrue Pro noise-canceling earbuds
entries.description: Perfect for on the go or just relaxing at home, you can also enjoy an extra 60 days of Tidal when you buy these buds.

entries.title: The 4 best game consoles of 2023
entries.description: We analyzed design, pricing, and functionality to find the best game consoles. But it's hard to beat the Playstation 5 with specs that impress just as much as design.

entries.title: How to create and view an outline in Google Docs
entries.description: Outlines make it much easier to organize and navigate longer documents, and Google Docs is no stranger to the feature. Find out how to create and view your first outline.

entries.title: The 6 best fitness apps with online workouts in 2023
entries.description: Movement made easy: Our top picks for the best fitness apps with online workout programs will make your 2023 activity goals a reality.

entries.title: The 5 best treadmills of 2023
entries.description: If your New Year's resolution is to exercise more, look no further than these top-of-the-line treadmills -- including the NordicTrack Commercial 1750.

entries.title: The 5 best PC gaming headsets of 2023
entries.description: The best PC gaming headsets have virtual surround sound, spatial audio, and noise-canceling technology, so you can focus on your game without ambient sound.

entries.title: Arlo security cameras see a $280 discount at Best Buy
entries.description: Keep the package thieves off of your porch with this Arlo Pro 4 Spotlight camera bundle for just $320 during Best Buy's four day sale happening now.

entries.title: How to access Nike fitness classes on Netflix
entries.description: Like to stream fitness classes? If you're a Netflix subscriber, you now have more options (for no additional cost).

entries.title: Two companies still dominate smartphone sales, but it's been a tough, tough year
entries.description: The fourth quarter is usually bumped up by holiday sales, but this quarter was the worst in a decade, according to analyst Canalys.

entries.title: Apple to delay AR glasses and focus on mixed reality headset
entries.description: Don't expect Apple augmented reality glasses anytime soon, but keep your fingers crossed to see an Apple mixed reality headset in 2023 and buy one in 2024.

entries.title: Ransomware decryption: This tool could help some BianLian ransomware victims get files back
entries.description: Cybersecurity researchers at Avast release a decryption tool for BianLian ransomware, which has hit victims in the US, UK, Australia, and more.

entries.title: Microsoft is planning more big job cuts, according to reports
entries.description: Microsoft will reportedly announce thousands of job cuts as early as Wednesday morning US time.

entries.title: Singapore researchers create glove with 'enhanced' virtual touch
entries.description: Dissatisfied with existing products in the market, a research team from National University of Singapore says its HaptGlove uses haptic feedback to let users better experience the shape, size, and texture of objects in virtual environments.

entries.title: The 5 best under-desk treadmills of 2023
entries.description: Under-desk treadmills allow you to work and work out at the same time. Place one of our best picks underneath your desk to optimize your daily routine.

entries.title: How to use your iPhone as a TV remote
entries.description: Stop fumbling for a different mobile app every time your TV's remote goes MIA. The easiest solution is in your iPhone already.
